author: Special Correspondent
text:
Kauvery Hospital on Wednesday launched a critical care app that will act as a quick reference guide for clinic staff to recognise and respond to acutely ill patients, a press release said.

The app will provide a systematic and structured approach for staff, and has been developed in Chennai as a collaborative effort with the Greater Manchester Critical Care Network, UK. The app helps reduce damage caused by sepsis: it will support doctors to quickly assess and identify patients with a ‘sepsis screening tool.
title: Kauvery Hospital launches critical care app
